lstDialogOne: I'm on the prowel, looking to start a spanking new business chain
And your kingdom looks just dashing!
Want to lend us a hand?
I could make us both very rich
I'd need a small loan of 5 coins, but as they say, you have to spend money to make money! |c
lstOutcomeNoText: Nevermind, I'll pay for it myself, toodle pip!
lstCantAffordText: Sadly, I haven't the time for the 'lower classes'
